customer.title: How does the customer application work?
customer.description: This application is intended for people who need a service. They log in and write down the problems or service they need. If the requested service matches the service provided by a nearby service provider, the provider is notified.

provider.title: How does the expert (craftsman) application work?
provider.description: This program is intended for people or companies wishing to provide services. They register, choose their location, and list the services they offer. They also give a little description about themselves and upload photos of their work. This helps customers understand what they do and the quality of their work.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Find answers to common questions about our platform

questions.question: How do I find service providers in my area?
questions.answer: Simply enter your location and the type of service you need in our search bar. Our platform will show you verified providers near you with ratings and reviews.

questions.question: Are all service providers verified?
questions.answer: Yes, all service providers go through a verification process including background checks, license verification, and quality assessments before joining our platform.

questions.question: How do I pay for services?
questions.answer: You can pay through our secure platform using credit cards, debit cards, or cash on delivery. All payments are processed securely through our system.

questions.question: What if I'm not satisfied with the service?
questions.answer: We have a customer satisfaction guarantee. If you're not happy with the service, contact our support team within 24 hours and we'll work to resolve the issue.

questions.question: How do I become a service provider?
questions.answer: Download our provider app, complete the registration process, submit required documents for verification, and once approved, you can start accepting bookings.

questions.question: What areas do you cover in Iraq?
questions.answer: We currently operate in major Iraqi cities including Baghdad, Basra, Erbil, Mosul, and Najaf, with plans to expand to more cities soon.

questions.question: How do I cancel or reschedule a booking?
questions.answer: You can cancel or reschedule bookings through the app up to 2 hours before the scheduled time. Some providers may have different cancellation policies.

questions.question: Is there a minimum service charge?
questions.answer: Service charges vary by provider and service type. Each provider sets their own rates, which are displayed upfront before you book.

questions.question: How do I contact customer support?
questions.answer: You can reach our customer support through the app's help section, email us at support@worktok.org, or call our helpline at (+964) 7519-904-575.

questions.question: Do you offer emergency services?
questions.answer: Yes, we have emergency service providers available 24/7 for urgent repairs like plumbing leaks, electrical issues, and lock-outs.
